website_summaries.verdict: These 1" individual pieces provide an escape that also happens to be easy to clean and non-toxic.
pros: Outdoor fire pits will benefit from this durable glass that is not only classy in its look, but capable of high heat
Bonus points for being easy to clean
cons: May be a broken piece here and there

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Look!
customer_reviews.text: Caribbean Blue is an absolutely beautiful color and makes a statement in our propane fire pit. Perfect match to the color of our pool. We have received so many amazing compliments. Unfortunately, after each use, we’ve experienced broken pieces of the glass cubes. Surprised, but not concerned. Now the product is apparently unavailable, which is very disappointing because at some stage we will need more to replace the broken pieces, which were removed and thrown away. Oh well, guess we won’t remove them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: E. Firth

customer_reviews.title: Charred & Broken
customer_reviews.text: After 1 year of moderate to little use, this fire glass is charred and broken. If I recall from the packaging, the glass can be cleaned with water and vinegar, but since so many pieces are broken we’re just going to replace it (with another brand).
customer_reviews.author: mir23

customer_reviews.title: Glass Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Had these since August and after about 8X using the fire pit the glass cubes where breaking in half. Poor quality. In the past I used the round glass beads from a different mfg and had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jams

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks nice, not as bright as the photo, but not going to split hairs. A couple of broken pieces out of the bag, but just removed them. We will see how they stand up to heat over time! I have a 80,000 BTU fire pit, so it will get hot! Took three 10 pound bags. Weighed them and they were actually 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful in our glass fire table. The color is very pretty and looks great. Very happy with this purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Color

customer_reviews.title: Charred after one use! I would not recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Glass cracks / tarnishes
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased the glass cubes for our natural gas outdoor fireplace. Unfortunately, after only about five hours of use, several pieces have cracked and several are discolored. The discoloration cleans off easily, but I had not planned to clean hundreds of pieces after each use.

Designed for use in propane and natural gas indoor fire place, fire pits, outdoor fire bowls as well as decorative in garden,back yard,fish tank,swimming pool,flower pot and so on
It does a wonderful job of covering the entire floor of a fire feature, effectively hiding the unseemly pipes and tubes.
